full_summary:
**Request for Proposal: STRAINER, SEDIMENT**
================================================

**Reference Number:** CB-7332-99114926
**Publication Date:** July 19, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** August 28, 2023, 2:00 PM
**Expected Contract Start Date:** November 1, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 29, 2024

**Summary:**
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for Strainer, Sediment. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

**Solicitation Details:**

* The solicitation is open to all interested suppliers.
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.

**Contract Requirements:**
================================

The successful bidder must deliver the following items:

1. Item 1:
	* GSIN: 4730
	* NSN: 21-901-4308
	* Part No.: 8510111
	* Quantity: 4
	* Unit of Issue: EA
	* Delivery location: CFB Esquimalt
2. Item 2:
	* GSIN: 4730
	* NSN: 21-901-4308
	* Part No.: 8510111
	* Quantity: 4
	* Unit of Issue: EA
	* Delivery location: CFB Halifax

**Negotiation Rights:**
The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Language:**
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**How to Bid:**
-----------------------------

To submit your bid, please follow the instructions provided in the solicitation document, available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7332/rfp-w8482-241817-a-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7332/rfp-w8482-241817-a-en.pdf) (English) or [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7332/rfp-w8482-241817-a-fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/web
